ORIGAM Documentation : Transformation Reference

Created by Tomáš Vavrda, last modified on Oct 02, 2014

This element allows you to pass a transformation script to the DataTransformationService.Transform method.

Attributes

TransformationSelect the transformation script, which should be used by the service.
